headline: Prediction: 2 Stocks That Will Be Worth More Than Ford 10 Years From Now
summary: Ford Motor has a $40 billion market cap but is set to struggle in the next decade.  Rocket Lab is growing quickly and is a high-risk stock with a lot of potential upside.  Occidental Petroleum can generate tons of free cash flow for your portfolio.
